title: Purple Chest Gave me a skin shard of a champion I do not own.
body:
I bought Xayah on this account. She is the only champion I own. I opened my purple chest and it gives me a viktor skin. I don't own viktor. 
Please help. Thanks.

replies.body: That chest is designed to give you a skin that costs 975 RP for one of the champions you own, but in this case, Xayah doesn't have any skins that cost that much.
